title: Love Island's Vanessa Sierra's racy past as a TOPLESS waitress is exposed
text:
Love Island Australia star Vanessa Sierra's secret past as a topless waitress has been exposed as she competes on the reality TV show in Fiji.

Leaked footage supplied to Daily Mail Australia shows the 25-year-old reality TV star performing a dance completely topless.

Appearing comfortable and confident baring her assets on camera, Vanessa is seen laughing and pouting while putting on the sexy show with another woman.

Naked ambition! Love Island's Vanessa Sierra's racy past as a TOPLESS waitress has been exposed as footage emerges of the brunette performing a saucy dance in just a pair of lacy knickers

Vanessa is currently 'coupled up' with Love Island Australia co-star Matthew Zukowski, 24.

Despite using a filter that gave the raven-haired beauty the appearance of a beard, Vanessa is easily recognisable in the video.

Her large distinctive sleeve of tattoos made her clearly identifiable in the clip.

She's not shy! Leaked footage supplied to Daily Mail Australia shows the 25-year-old reality TV star performing a dance topless with another woman

What would Matt think? Vanessa is currently 'coupled up' with Love Island Australia co-star Matthew Zukowski, 24

Tatt's definitely Vanessa! The reality TV star's large distinctive sleeve of tattoos made her clearly identifiable in the clip

Man, she feels like a woman! Vanessa chose to use a filter that gave her the appearance of a beard in the seductive clip

Vanessa is animated in the clip, posing up a storm in a red pair of lingerie underwear.

Her G-string bottoms showed off her pert derriere, while the design sat high upon her svelte waist with criss-cross straps.

The French-Australian model, who has a Master's degree in computer science, also wears a pair of over-the-knee heeled boots as she dances with a friend.

At one point, she drops to the floor and spreads her legs while smiling for the camera.

Vanessa has posted numerous topless photos in the past on her Instagram feed, and many other racy bikini and lingerie uploads.

That's cheeky! Her G-string bottoms showed off her pert derriere, while the design sat high upon Vanessa's svelte waist with criss-cross straps

Racy in red! At one point, Vanessa drops to the floor and spreads her legs while smiling for the camera next to a friend in a matching red ensemble

Earlier this year, Vanessa split with MAFS star Jessika Power's brother Rhyce.

After the couple's split, she was then rumoured to be dating Jessika's ex-boyfriend Dan Webb.

Vanessa is now searching for love on Love Island Australia, and has so far only been 'coupled up' with Matthew.
description: Love Island Australia star Vanessa Sierra's secret past as a topless waitress has been exposed as she competes on the reality TV show in Fiji.
